ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup hot sauce, or more as needed
1 (10 ounce) container refrigerated thin crust pizza dough (such as Pillsbury®)

cookingTips: Mix filling with cream cheese at room temperature for easier spreading and better flavor distribution
Don't overfill the dough - seal edges well to prevent leaking during baking
Let stromboli cool 5 minutes after baking before slicing for easier portioning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This recipe shortcuts homemade pizza dough. Explain how using prepared dough can still result in delicious results while saving time.
